name: colress-machine
short_effect: Wakes up the Crustle blocking the way in Seaside Cave.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A special device that wrings out the potential of Pokémon. It’s an imperfect prototype.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A special device that wrings out the potential of Pokémon. It’s an imperfect prototype.
